title: Unified Cognitive Artifact (UCA) Schema
description: The standardized JSON envelope used across TriForge, DiscoverabilityOps, and all Engines/Faces for structured cognitive outputs.

model.description: Model or provider generating the artifact. Examples: openai:gpt-5.1, perplexity:sonar, claude:3.2

component.description: The Engine or module responsible for this artifact. e.g., discoveryops.engine, roast.engine, mdp.engine

property.description: What part of the engine this artifact represents. Example: d_score, fix_levers, adr_breakdown, competitor_matrix.

context.description: The operational and query context used to generate this artifact.

input.description: Raw user input submitted for processing.

region.description: Geographic region or market context used in the query.

industry.description: Industry classification used by the Engine.

timestamp.description: ISO timestamp when the artifact was produced.

deployment_mode.description: Where the Engine was deployed when generating this artifact.

data.description: The core output payload generated by the Engine.
